channel.title: Projects on Dhiraj Balakrishnan
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Dhiraj Balakrishnan

item.title: IPL Analytics
item.description: Overview We’ve all been engulfed by an uncertainity that is COVID-19 which doesn’t seem to be going anywhere anytime soon. Of all the stuff that has come to an indefinite standstill, sporting action, especially cricket is something that we are missing the most. It is now that time of the year where we would ideally be getting out of a hangover from the IPL. I have been an avid follower of the Indian Premier League from its inception, so much so that I wanted to fill in this void of having no IPL by looking at some of its data points and this exercise led me to build a side project.
